subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Blackhawks’ six-game Stanley Cup finals victory over the Boston Bruins averaged 5.76 million viewers on NBC and the NBC Sports Network, the most-watched finals since 1994.
snippet: The Chicago Blackhawks’ six-game Stanley Cup finals victory over the Boston Bruins averaged 5.76 million viewers on NBC and the NBC Sports Network, the most-watched finals since 1994.
